title: It's Time (2015)
overview: A high profile crime lord wakes up one morning besides his dead wife with no memory of what happened. It's time for him to make a decision and choose between his life and his power.
storyline: Jose 'Mala Muerte' (Ugly Death) is a high profile crime lord who woke up one morning besides his dead wife with no memory of what happened. It's time for him to make a decision and choose between his life and his power. This is a portrait of one-man journey from hate and vengeance to love and forgiveness.
